meanings.definition: The lower part of the brainstem.
meanings.sent1: The myelencephalon is responsible for controlling basic life functions.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the myelencephalon to understand its crucial role in the body.
meanings.sent3: When the myelencephalon throws a party, all the other brain parts attend!
meanings.sent4: The myelencephalon is like the foundation of a building, supporting everything above it.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the myelencephalon as the roots of a tree, anchoring and nourishing the entire structure.

meanings.sent1: In biology class, we learned about the myelencephalon, also known as the medulla oblongata.
meanings.sent2: The myelencephalon helps regulate breathing and heart rate.
meanings.sent3: The myelencephalon and the cerebellum had a race to see who could control movement better!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the myelencephalon's control over vital functions.
meanings.sent5: The myelencephalon is like the captain of the body, ensuring everything runs smoothly.
